✱	Food should be cooked as per individual choice.
✱	It is best to concentrate on food while eating and finish with a peaceful mind.
✱	Food should neither be very hot nor very cold.

122
✱	Liquid/water intake should be more frequent and in small amounts.
✱	Rich food should be taken in a limited quantity and frugally. 
✱	Heavy food should not be taken at night. The proper time for night meals is 
two to three hours before going to bed. 
✱	One should eat only when the last meal has been digested and one feels hungry.
✱	For overall good health, one or two proper meals are sufficient. Other than this, if hungry, one can have fruits, dry fruits, a salad, liquids or milk.
✱	Every meal should contain all six tastes namely sweet, sour, salty, pungent, bitter, and astringent.
✱	One should start with sweets/salad/water/fruits, then proceed to the main course, and end it with chewing fennel, cardamom, clove, betel leaf , etc.
